verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--praśna lāgi' āilāma tomāra sthāne
kājī kahe,--ājñā kara, ye tomāra mane

synonyms: prabhu kahe—the Lord said; praśna lāgi'-just to inquire from you; āilāma—I have come; tomāra sthāne—at your place; kājī kahe—the Kazi replied; ājñā kara—just order me; ye—whatever; tomāra mane—(is) in Your mind.
translation:
The Lord said, "My dear uncle, I have come to your home just to ask you some questions."
 
"Yes," the Kazi replied, "You are welcome. Just tell me what is in Your mind."
